post.body: thanks! ugh....that's so depressing. It's Harry Potter all over again.
what!? WTF Noooooo. There's no way. I mean New Moon is already going to suck ass but nooo!
what!? We need it posted on the site now! lol shit! thats stupid!
for ur info mr. i hadnt tweeted hardly all day and i had to make up for it. Edward's a chimo!
yay. I'm soo happy for you! I'm glad its all going well.
I misssss you!! Even tho ur closer...humm... But i agree :(
true that! Look at Harry Potter. lol. Perfectly not funny example.
I know! I'm sad about it too. I just hope whoever directs it is, at least, a girl. I mean it's New Moon. A guy will not get it.
good enough for you hannah? lol
Is ForeverTwilight.com still allowed to use your banners?
yeah Robbie made it. Robbie who I don't think likes us anymore. lol. But we haven't got bitched at for using his shit yet lol.
I totally forgot about that! They absoulety can't recast after that. It was great!
i could stand him in BD i thought the chp names were funny. But yes Jacob is a stupid, annoying dog lol I vote Taylor Lautner
true that. Boys always like the dogs...
haha thats why she needs to read the books! Im taking my dad to the movie & forcing NM on him evn tho he said Twilight was gurly
Yes lol It's crazy. I'm glad your mom liked Twilight thats awesome!
ooo thats awesome! I'll have to read those!
's account has been hacked by @abercrombieenad dont listen!
it wasnt the stomach flu it was the nora virus. yay me
since twilight im scared 2 b old thre is a lot i wnt 2 do n my expectations are so high I jst knw im goin 2 eff it up make nthing of myself
Doode be sure check it. They are legit they sponsored Sonorus yo. I didn't know that. AND I felt like being gangsta-sorry about that.
I fo'sho get to b on the Webmasters pannel at the Forks Twilight convention! whoot! Check it out: http://www.litfanevents.org/summerinforks/
off work early!
finally my break. I hate mondays. Its like the children know and try to raise as much hell as they can.
My mother stole my babyphat coat and now its too big. Ily2 mother.
I have the stomach flu...great. The best kind. ugh. Now i have to go work with kids, germ infested, unsanitary. Finals tomorrow :(
i slept on the bathroom floor last night. i was that sick. At least i dont have class today.
What!? Taylor Lautner beat jackson and kellan in teen magazines hot list!? Oh hell no!
I can hear the christmas music loud and clear now! :)
I killed the fly1
my mothers telling my grandma how hot Edward/Cedric is my bro says if he raped her she wud b a necrophliac she says u cnt rape the willing
studying my ass off for finals. I'm soo not prepared.
watching harry potter and the behind the scenes HBP stuff on abc
Correction: oh world of twitter: Edward in the movie is a chimo. happy? or did i just lose followers?
All of my IRL friends (lol) got rid of twitter, probably because they were tired of me :( I'm glad I still have you guys! :)
she showed. thank god! 1min35sec before it was over. phew.
The girl in our term presentation group who was in charge of our 200pt project isnt here! Oh. My. God. Shit! I worked for weeks on the story
Ok ok. I admit it. The reason is I ran through almost every restroom at Eastern Washington University looking 4 an effing tampon B4 my final
I am hot. I am sweating. It is below freezing and I have to be going through menopause or somthing!
Please oh please gods of my gas tank. please let me get to my final, back is optional. I'm eff'd.
My back hurts. I can't sleep. Another con of a daycare job. On another note. I'm not firing any1 @emilyflippy nor @iHannahE
crying over the biggest loser with my grandma.
ugh! Finals! So i failed my french final (idk actually :p) im worried about history *tries to jam 140yrs of US history in her brain*
I had to choose between whitening strips and pop. I chose pop. For all u ppl that are currently laughing i mean *cough* soda.
Hi my twitter life. I'm back. Sorry my phone went m.i.a. for awhile
my phone dies for 24 hours and i have 62 unread messages! Holy shit!
Oh My Goddnes! Almost an inch already! i swear!
holy shit is it snowing or what!?
Here it comes. We wont see grass till April. The snow is here. eff washington. i want to move to california.
3 carts and $871 later we leave costco. its hard to text in gloves.
usually costco is fun but when it comes to daycare owners costco trips its suicide. usually 4 carts.
4hr wait for my snowtires...
I never direct replied via twitter txt so idk if it worked lol
I have officially reached 100 followers, which is pretty cool! I don't know how you can put up w/ me on here, thanks :)
Dear Summit, besides getting ur story straight. Please release the really hot Edward biting Bella screenshot the illegals arent that good.
Chris Weitz is not OFFICIAL, for directing New Moon btw, check out forevertwilight.com for more on this.
Why am i up so early? I'm free!-don't I know that?
It is soo foggy! I thought it was bad this morning. Might as well go smoke a bowl with kristin stewart.
Why do people look at you so funny when ur dancing in the musical card isle in walmart? I mean it is walmart.
it is crazy foggy!
I'm a spaz. Sooo much caffeine!
Freedom! Yes! My first college finals succesfully? over! Vacation time, well except for work, damnit.
im pretty sure im orange but idk exactly. I dont have a mirror and checking with ur camera phone is overrated. I spill coffee btw.
They have them!
Going to the rich peoples mall to see if thry have Edwards sunglasses. lol
I hate people. thanks for letting me in effers. at the same intersection for 3 red lights...
Just coughed up some major blood. From when my dog ran over my face.
its -1 degress outside and its not even officially winter til 4:04am Sunday morning...great
I was innocently sleeping when my dog decided to jump on my face.
my dog is depressed. since we got a new puppy she just sits there w/ her ball in her mouth and cries. It's soo sad.
Bella should be embaressed for what she is wearing in the kitchen, apple scene. Eww thats worse than the bowling shirt. wtf.
totally didn't mean to make it pink sorry guys, literally guys. It'll be a neutral color asap lmao
I just changed the banner on http://forevertwilight.com is cooler than the other one lol. And thanks EVERYONE ily.
Thank you @decoystars lol. Shall I plug it once more? http://forevertwilight.com haha
If every1 following me went on ForeverTwilight.com it wud make me happy along w/ tweeters such as @kristincullen @emilyflippy @iHannahE ect
Its currently -5 degrees. Getting gas was more of a pain in the ass than usual in the skating rink known as Spoko fuel
shit no gas. *crosses* fingers i will make it to spoko fuel!
on my 10min break...whooho only hours to go.
Eff. Work.
I got a Wii! I hope they're gonna have a Twilight video game..lol can you imagine? Press A to kiss Edward. Shake up and down to make babies
my moms trying to rape Edward! shes kissing him! My grandma is even fighting over him. Family=dysfunction
I had a Twilight christmas! yay!
Going to my 4th christmas! I can't wait for hella food!
Theres a new banner!?
My madre lost her cellphone outside. Its deff gone till june, maybe july. It's still snowing. This christmas in the NW song is crap.
Merry Christmas! <3
I just screamed and jumped when i entered my room. Edwards freaking creepy. I have so many youtube vids in the making.
my dog wont stop barking at Edward! i have video.
Did you know that trans siberan orch was a heavey metal band named Savatage? Crazy!
Finished with my 2nd christmas which was awesome. 3 more christmases to go, yes i have 5.
I have no service down here so ttfn tata for now.
Going down the canyon to now have christmas with my dads side of the family
Omg someone just proposed in church. In the middle of the service. Wow. people are cool....
